title: Dehumanization
summary: Dehumanization is the denial of full humanness in others and the cruelty and suffering that accompanies it.[1][2][3] A practical definition refers to it as the viewing and treatment of other persons as though they lack the mental capacities that are commonly attributed to human beings.[4] In this definition, every act or thought that regards a person as "less than" human is dehumanization.[5]
